name: Davis, Saperstein & Salomon, P.C.
tag_list: car-accidents, trucking-accidents, motorcycle-accidents, aviation-accidents, premises-liability, medical-malpractice, birth-injuries, spinal-cord-injuries, wrongful-accidental-death
overview: Davis, Saperstein & Salomon, PC. 1-800 LAW 2000 is a personal injury law firm representing people injured as a result of an accident. Common motor vehicle accidents typically involve a car, truck, motorcycle, or bus. Accidents in stores include slip, trip and falls, bad security, ice and snow injuries. The firm also represents workers injured on the job, inluding construction and union workers. Davis, Saperstein & Salomon, PC has helped people injured by dangerous prescription drugs and has been a leader in the mass tort field. During its 25 years the firm has helped its clients recover over $400 million in settlements. The firm has offices through out New Jersey and New York. The firm has 5 trial attorneys certified as civil trial attorneys by the Supreme Court of New Jersey.
